answers.answer: I'm 31 wk also under Gestational Diabetic monitoring. Till now i gained 3kilo.I focus on meat, veg less rice(small bowl brown rice). Eg. Breakfast macdonald sausage wrap, 1 hashbrown n 1 pkt low fat milk, snack 1 cup skim milk with 3 ps wholemeal biscuits, lunch alio alio pasta with zero coke,snack 1 cup skim milk, dinner slice fish soup noodle.

question: Hello ladies,Anyone dealing with gestational diabetes? I am 30 weeks tomorrow and been diagnosed with GDM, my fasting levels were ok but both the 1 hour and 2 hour levels were a little high. I am on a low carb, high protein diet and some walking each day. I have to monitor my levels 2 hours post each meal and must get a reading under 120. Been managing so far, but had 2 high readings in 4 days (12 readings). Wanted to know are others in the same boat? What advice has your doc given u?  I have gained 7 kilos so far, so no massive weight gain.
title: 30 weeks pregnant with generational diabetes
